title: Motley Fool Money: 03.15.2013
description: The Dow hits an all-time high.  Samsung unveils its latest rival to the iPhone.  And Mayor Bloomberg suffers a sweet defeat.
content:encoded: The Dow hits an all-time high.  Samsung unveils its latest rival to the iPhone.  And Mayor Bloomberg suffers a sweet defeat.
